arts.ttl: Chelsea suffer major injury blow as forward limps off in Fulham clash
arts.sum: Chelsea suffer a major injury blow after Liam Delap picks up a hamstring issue in Saturday's Premier League clash with Fulham.

arts.ttl: Furious Fulham boss Marco Silva confronts referee Robert Jones after Josh King is harshly denied the opening goal away at Chelsea
arts.sum: The decision infuriated Fulham and drew heavy criticism from pundits. Joe Cole told TNT Sports: 'Chalobah goes to win the ball on the halfway line and there is contact but it's not a foul.

arts.ttl: Marco Silva had already complained about referee Rob Jones before controversial Fulham goal disallowed vs Chelsea
arts.sum: Fulham were on the end of a controversial refereeing decision in their Premier League clash vs Chelsea when youngster Josh King saw his goal disallowed...

arts.ttl: Fans fume at latest VAR controversy as Premier League issue explanation
arts.sum: Fulham thought they had taken the lead against London rivals Chelsea at Stamford Bridge on Saturday through Josh King's strike but the goal was controversially ruled out by referee Robert Jones

arts.ttl: Chelsea striker Liam Delap limps off against Fulham with hamstring injury
arts.sum: What might have been Liam Delap's first full 90 minutes for Chelsea ended after less than a quarter of an hour on Saturday. Delap started up front against Fulham at Stamford Bridge.

arts.ttl: Chelsea v Fulham: Premier League – live
arts.sum: Updates from the 12.30pm BST kick-off at Stamford Bridge Live scores | League tables | Sign up for Football Daily Marco Silva’s pre-match thoughts We are ready for a very, very tough game. We had a good performance last Sunday and we did the job with eight changes in midweek. We have our plan – it’s not for us to talk about that now, I’d prefer for us to express that on the field. We know what we want from the game. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Chelsea vs Fulham live: Palmer injury blow ahead of London derby in Premier League
arts.sum: The two local rivals meet with Chelsea shorn of their talisman early in the Premier League season
